name: 岩石圈應力場
goals: Introduce causes and types of the stress field in the lithosphere and rock failure criterion
Understand methods of the in-situ stress measurement.
Illustrate how to explain results of in-situ rock stress.
Comprehend the distribution and explanation of lithospheric stress field.
syllabus:
16+2 flexible weeks, last 2 weeks are self-learning

01\. Introduction                                      

02\. Force & Stress                          

03\. Failure Criteria                                 

04\. Rock Stress Terminology                 

05\. Crustal Stress Model                        

06\. Physics of Stress Measurements              

07\. Stress Measurement: Hydraulic Fracturing

08\. Stress Measurement: Loading & Reloading                            

09\. Field Trip                 

10\. Stress Measurement: Strain Recovery                             

11\. Stress Measurement: Drilling-Induced Fractures            

12\. Stress Measurement: Stress Inversion                   

13\. Lithospheric Strength               

14\. Local Stress Data             

15\. Global Stress Data           

16\. Final Report                     

17\. Stress Measurement: Others (Self-Learning)           

18\. Wedge Mechanics (Self-Learning)

methodologies.note: Let students be familiar with topic via discussion
Understand the stress measurement with lab exercises
Train student the ability of stress analysis via field excursion
Let student reach the course objectives via term project

prerequisite: ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
